item.title: Shortcodes
item.description: Minimo comes with several shortcodes built-in. Shortcode: center Center align you content. center: Parameters Markdown content between opening and closing tags. center: Usage Example {{< center >}} _Center Aligned Text_ {{< /center >}} Output: Center Aligned Text Shortcode: convo Renders conversation blocks. convo: Parameters sep [String] (optional): seperator between person and text (default: “:") convo: Inner Syntax person :: text You can remove the person part, if you want.
